  17. (*************************** Checkpoints *******************************)

  19. open Int64ops
  20. open Debugcom
  21. open Primitives

  23. (*** A type for checkpoints. ***)

  25. ‌type checkpoint_state =
  26.     C_stopped
  27.   | C_running of int64

  29. (* `c_valid' is true if and only if the corresponding
  30. * process is connected to the debugger.
  31. * `c_parent' is the checkpoint whose process is parent
  32. * of the checkpoint one (`root' if no parent).
  33. * c_pid = -2 for root pseudo-checkpoint.
  34. * c_pid =  0 for ghost checkpoints.
  35. * c_pid = -1 for kill checkpoints.
  36. *)
  37. ‌type checkpoint = {
  38.   mutable c_time : int64;
  39.   mutable c_pid : int;
  40.   mutable c_fd : io_channel;
  41.   mutable c_valid : bool;
  42.   mutable c_report : report option;
  43.   mutable c_state : checkpoint_state;
  44.   mutable c_parent : checkpoint;
  45.   mutable c_breakpoint_version : int;
  46.   mutable c_breakpoints : (pc * int ref) list;
  47.   mutable c_trap_barrier : Sp.t;
  48.   mutable c_code_fragments : int list
  49.   }

  51. (*** Pseudo-checkpoint `root'. ***)
  52. (* --- Parents of all checkpoints which have no parent. *)
  53. ‌let rec root = {
  54.   c_time = _0;
  55.   c_pid = -2;
  56.   c_fd = std_io;
  57.   c_valid = false;
  58.   c_report = None;
  59.   c_state = C_stopped;
  60.   c_parent = root;
  61.   c_breakpoint_version = 0;
  62.   c_breakpoints = [];
  63.   c_trap_barrier = Sp.null;
  64.   c_code_fragments = [main_frag]
  65.   }

  67. (*** Current state ***)
  68. ‌let checkpoints =
  69.   ref ([] : checkpoint list)

  71. ‌let current_checkpoint =
  72.   ref root

  74. ‌let current_time () =
  75.   !current_checkpoint.c_time

  77. ‌let current_report () =
  78.   !current_checkpoint.c_report

  80. ‌let current_pc_sp () =
  81.   (* This pattern matching mimics the test used in debugger.c for
  82.      deciding whether or not PC/SP should be sent with the report.
  83.      See debugger.c, the [if] statement above the [command_loop]
  84.      label. *)
  85.   match current_report () with
  86.   | Some {rep_type = Event | Breakpoint;
  87.           rep_program_pointer = pc; rep_stack_pointer = sp } -> Some (pc, sp)
  88.   | _ -> None

  90. ‌let current_pc () = Option.map fst (current_pc_sp ())
